jobDescription: The Reporting Analyst is responsible for designing, creating and verifying data reports, metrics and visualizations of post market surveillance and sales data.The workflow is largely Business Objects reporting, followed by post processing in Excel.The Analyst is responsible for project management of the reports, including defining and negotiating reporting requirements with various clients.MUST have Advanced Excel Skills, for this role, i.e. (nested formulas, conditionals, vlookups, power query, etc.)Experience in Business Object (BO is most preferred. Will consider candidates with other similar query and report tools such as DOMO, Tableau, Spotfire, MS Power BI, etc.)
